subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chicago’s captain, Jonathan Toews, scored twice in the first period and Corey Crawford made 35 saves as the Blackhawks dispatched the Ducks in Game 7.
snippet: Chicago’s captain, Jonathan Toews, scored twice in the first period and Corey Crawford made 35 saves as the Blackhawks dispatched the Ducks in Game 7.
